description: This halloumi salad has a sweet sticky dressing which compliments the flavour of beetroot.
name: Halloumi & Beetroot Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Once the halloumi and beetroot is ready, you can remove from the oven and toss with the salad leave and drizzle with dressing before serving.
